trans-unit.source: Stores sink provider data for sink providers.

The sink provider data is a tree structure of configuration information stored in the [\<provider> Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d3e67e16-8ca3-4b7f-b7a4-37e3e1a66364) configuration nodes.

All sink providers must have a constructor that accepts a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties and a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of these structures if they want to be used from a configuration file.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> class.
The name of the sink provider that the data in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> object is associated with.
Gets a list of the child <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> nodes.
A <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> of the child <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> nodes.
Gets the name of the sink provider that the data in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> object is associated with.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> with the name of the XML node that the data in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> object is associated with.
Gets a dictionary through which properties on the sink provider can be accessed.
A dictionary through which properties on the sink provider can be accessed.
